member.name: M:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.CertificateInstaller.EnsureChainIsInstalled(System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2Collection)
member.summary: Ensures the specified certs (presumably in a chain) are in the cert store.
member.remarks: Because Intermediate Authorities may have been issued by the uploaded CA, the application must present the full chain of certificates from the one used during authentication to the one uploaded to the service. See for more information.
member.param: The certificate chain to ensure is installed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationStatusType
member.summary: The provisioning status type.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationStatusType.Unassigned
member.summary: Device has not yet come on-line

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationStatusType.Assigning
member.summary: Device has connected to the DRS but IoT Hub Id has not yet been returned to the device

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationStatusType.Assigned
member.summary: DRS successfully returned a device Id and connection string to the device

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationStatusType.Failed
member.summary: Device enrollment failed

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationStatusType.Disabled
member.summary: Device is disabled

member.name: T:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationSubstatusType
member.summary: The provisioning substatus type.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationSubstatusType.InitialAssignment
member.summary: Device has been assigned to an IoT hub for the first time

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationSubstatusType.DeviceDataMigrated
member.summary: Device has been assigned to a different IoT hub and its device data was migrated from the previously assigned IoT hub. Device data was removed from the previously assigned IoT hub.

member.name: F:Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Provisioning.Client.ProvisioningRegistrationSubstatusType.DeviceDataReset
member.summary: Device has been assigned to a different IoT hub and its device data was populated from the initial state stored in the enrollment. Device data was removed from the previously assigned IoT hub.
